rooms.description: North facing entrance to the bungalow; designed with natural light and a welcoming space. Vastu aligned for positive energy flow.
Eco-friendly living space with open-plan design, incorporating sustainable materials and energy-efficient windows. Natural ventilation is maximized by strategically placed openings.
Adjacent to the living room with ample space for dining; designed for natural lighting and ventilation.
Modern, energy-efficient kitchen with sustainable materials and proper Vastu placement of the main entrance and utilities to ensure positive energy flow.
Spacious master bedroom with dedicated balcony or terrace; designed for relaxation, privacy, and natural light. Vastu compliance ensures restful energy.
Well-lit and ventilated bedroom designed with eco-friendly materials, promoting comfort and well-being.
Additional bedroom for family or guest use; incorporates sustainable design principles.
Compact but functional bathroom with water-saving fixtures and eco-friendly tiles, adhering to Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: North-facing main entrance ensuring optimal energy flow per Vastu, with a covered porch to manage weather conditions.
Energy-efficient windows installed in all rooms for natural ventilation and lighting. Some windows positioned to enhance cross-breeze.
Balconies designed for relaxation and to allow views of the garden, ensuring a connection with nature.
Separate entrance for servants' quarters and service areas to maintain privacy and efficient workflow.

rooms.description: Compact bedroom for staff, ensuring adequate natural light and ventilation while following eco-friendly design principles.
Multi-purpose space for storage and minor maintenance activities, designed with sustainable materials.

openings.description: Separate service entrance ensuring easy access and privacy for the staff.
